docs.snippet: The United States Maritime Commission announced yesterday that a fortnightly freight service between the east coasts of North and South America would be started on Sept. 29 by a fleet of six cargo ships of the American Republics Line under the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Maritime Commission announced yesterday that a fortnightly freight service between the east coasts of North and South America would be started on Sept. 29 by a fleet of six cargo ships of the American Republics Line under the management of the Moore-McCormack Lines, Inc.
docs.abstract: Maritime Comm announces opening date of South Amer fortnightly freight service; details

docs.snippet: The largest advertising campaign in its history will be launched in the second week of October by P. Ballantine  Sons, Newark, with the major portion of the budget going into. newspapers. The drive, which will continue for one year, calls for...
docs.lead_paragraph: The largest advertising campaign in its history will be launched in the second week of October by P. Ballantine Sons, Newark, with the major portion of the budget going into. newspapers. The drive, which will continue for one year, calls for large-size space in 150 newspapers in 110 cities in the area in which the company has distribution.
